key.name: automatic-switching-enabled
key.description: Set this to TRUE to activate the automatic switching background.

key.name: idle-activation-enabled
key.description: Set this to TRUE to activate the screensaver when the session is idle.

key.name: lock-enabled
key.description: Set this to TRUE to lock the screen when the screensaver goes active.

key.name: sleep-activation-enabled
key.description: Set this to TRUE to lock the screen when the system goes sleep.

key.name: mode
key.description: The selection mode used by screensaver. May be "blank-only" to enable the screensaver without using any theme on activation, "single" to enable screensaver using only one theme on activation (specified in "themes" key), and "random" to enable the screensaver using a random theme on activation.

key.name: image-transition-effect
key.description: The selection effect used by screensaer which play images. May be "none" to play images without any transition effect. It's ignored when "mode" is not "image".

key.name: image-switch-interval
key.description: The number of seconds of time interval of switching images

key.name: themes
key.description: This key specifies the list of themes to be used by the screensaver. It's ignored when "mode" key is "blank-only", should provide the theme name when "mode" is "single", and should provide a list of themes when "mode" is "random".

key.name: power-management-delay
key.description: The number of seconds of inactivity before signalling to power management. This key is set and maintained by the session power management agent.

key.name: cycle-delay
key.description: The number of minutes to run before changing the screensaver theme.

key.name: lock-delay
key.description: The number of minutes after screensaver activation before locking the screen.

key.name: embedded-keyboard-enabled
key.summary: Allow embedding a keyboard into the window
key.description: Set this to TRUE to allow embedding a keyboard into the window when trying to unlock. The "keyboard_command" key must be set with the appropriate command.

key.name: embedded-keyboard-command
key.description: The command that will be run, if the "embedded_keyboard_enabled" key is set to TRUE, to embed a keyboard widget into the window. This command should implement an XEMBED plug interface and output a window XID on the standard output.

key.name: logout-enabled
key.description: Set this to TRUE to offer an option in the unlock dialog to allow logging out after a delay. The delay is specified in the "logout_delay" key.

key.name: logout-delay
key.description: The number of minutes after the screensaver activation before a logout option will appear in the unlock dialog. This key has effect only if the "logout_enable" key is set to TRUE.

key.name: logout-command
key.description: The command to invoke when the logout button is clicked. This command should simply log the user out without any interaction. This key has effect only if the "logout_enable" key is set to TRUE.

key.name: user-switch-enabled
key.description: Set this to TRUE to offer an option in the unlock dialog to switch to a different user account.

key.name: status-message-enabled
key.summary: Allow the session status message to be displayed
key.description: Allow the session status message to be displayed when the screen is locked.

key.name: background
key.description: Allow the user to set the background iamge of lockscreen.
